diff_act: 2.ensure both vehicles maintain full operational control
4.allow for continuous telemetry and payload data downlink to ensure effective monitoring and control

regen.absent_element: situation of telemetry and payload data downlink
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall ensure continuous telemetry and payload data downlink to support effective monitoring and control of the AV.

regen.absent_element: reception of telemetry and payload data downlink
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall receive telemetry and payload data from the AV via the downlink for monitoring and control purposes.

regen.new_specification: The TCS shall ensure continuous reception of telemetry and payload data via the downlink to maintain effective monitoring.
